website_summaries.verdict: Intended for higher impact water sports, this long sleeve rash guard protects your skin from abrasions. It may not, however, protect from the sun as well as other options.
pros: Made from high-density polyester that protects from rashes and cuts
Great selection of colors and sizes
cons: Consider sizing up unless you need a snug fit for water sports
Some claim that it does not block sun as well as other options

customer_reviews.title: BEST Outside Shirt Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt worked fantastic. Better than I could have imagined. (1) It fit perfect (I am 6'6", 200 lb and the XL was long enough), (2) It absolutely protected this white boy from the Mazatlan, Mexico sun, (3) When I got out of the water, its cooling effect was incredible, (4) With no seams the shirt was extremely smooth and nice enough to wear to the bar afterwards, and (5) Just use a towel to wipe the water off and it drys very, very quickly. I cannot say enough outstanding things about these shirts. I bought 2 of them and just kept alternating during my stay in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Big Foot

customer_reviews.title: If you are gonna swim and not get burned by the sun then...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice, protect your skin so you can swim or hang out on the beach or by the pool and not suffer from sun exposure. I even bought some for the grand kids, not this size. My babies and I can swim and have fun safely. Fit good, snug like it should, doesn't hinder while swimming neither. Glad I bought em.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Lazcano

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 2nd time buying this shirt. Husband likes the look and fit of this rash guard and it has helped to prevent sunburns while snorkeling and swimming. He especially likes that the collar is higher than other shirts, which gives some protection for his neck. My only issue has been that the seams come loose after a few washes and I've had to do some repair to keep from further fraying. We're buying a second one now in case the first one is ever beyond repair with my basic sewing skills.
customer_reviews.author: MtnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: great quality and fit(xs fits child)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shirt especially for this price. I am 5'9 180lbs and large fit perfect just snug enough with out looking like compression shirt. Also bought XS for my average size 12 yr old and fit him well. Material is comfortable and dries pretty quickly and does NOT feel clingy when wet. used it for snorkeling on vacation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fits well
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted something to protect his skin when we are out on the lake or snorkeling and this worked out well. We bought two different rash guards and ended up keeping both. It fits well, dries quickly, fabric is breathable, and the material is nice and soft, not at all scratchy. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SDubGold

customer_reviews.title: Definitely do not wear this on hot day.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, they don't market it as something to wear on particularly hot days. But I did, because I wanted the UV protection. Actually it makes a hot day worst. Better to wear no sleeves or something loose so the wind can blow through. I think the wicking feature actually makes it worse too, as air on sweat is very cooling, but the sweat is wicked away too quickly. Great tight fit though; feels like i'm wearing thermal wear. Great for swimming i'll bet.
customer_reviews.author: KUJayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Upf 50 plus is definitely awesome!! Protect yourself from the heat!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a freaking charm!! Good bye sunscreen on my body! This shirt works excellent!!! Underwater. The water will eventually get onto your skin but if you are wearing this to simply avoid the sun and have potential skin cancer or have skin cancer then now is the time to get your life back!! And start swimming again. I went to the beach with this on and swimming laps I cannot say how happy I am and my dermatologist told me about these kind or clothing so I'm happy to enjoy my life once again during scorching temperatures here in south Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Pogokoala

customer_reviews.title: The fit of the material is great wet or dry.
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall fit. I'm 6'2" 205 lbs. The tailored fit in the arms and shoulders is good and the looser area in the waist is exactly what I was looking for. I did not want it to fit like under armour in the waist. I use this shirt at the beach and it keeps me safe from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit...dries a little slow
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and feel of this shirt. I purchased one in my normal size and one in a size larger. My normal size fit snug, which I liked. The larger size was a little looser and still fit comfortably. The fabric worked as a sun blocker just fine, but it took quite a while for it to dry out. Once the shirt gets wet, it takes some doing to get it off as it sticks to your skin, so let it dry for a while or towel dry it before removing. Overall, I like the performance of these shirts and will continue to use them on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Capistrano Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Solid sun protection for someone sensitive to direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd TSLA UPF 50+ Rashguard. Normally, even with 30 SPF sunblock and a hat, if I'm out in sunlight for more than 30 minutes, especially direct sunlight, I get rashes, nausea and diarrhea. Most recently I wore the TSLA while on a sailboat with almost no shade on a sunny, cloudless day for 8 hours and my upper body didn't even get pink.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these in different color schemes . All the same fit. I bought Large and fit like NRS large shirts fit me. My purpose was sun protection while kayaking. I have used these many times as I kayak almost every day. Have been washed in machine at least 20 times. So far color is standing up fine. No tears or wearing out as of yet. Block sun as expected. Not a warm shirt BUT that's NOT what I bought these for. Great for summer outdoors. Great value as NRS shirts cost triple.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clune

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good, quality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: I like the length, however the stitching started to unravel after 3 washes, so it only lasted a couple weeks. The fit is good, but the quality just isn't there. I’ll probably stay with DRSKIN.
customer_reviews.author: Tactical Panda

customer_reviews.title: Worked In A Pinch
customer_reviews.text: Got this product in less than 24 hours, so it made my day! Worked in a day with UV 10-13 days out in the beach without any issues. It took care of the sun, with no sunburn, but just a slight tan appeared the next day. The material is nice and not bothersome. Stood up to a wash/dry without any issues. It's a solid product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have three of the TSLA rash guards now, and they all look great, fit well, and seem to last just fine. We're out paddle boarding all the time and it's really nice to go home at the end of the day without a sunburn. The fabric dries really fast and isn't heavy in the water when we're off the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member who came with us on a vacation snorkeling. That person wore a L size T shirt. This fit them perfectly (not overly tight). Easy to clean and fast to dry. Saves you a lot of hassle on sun screen. They even wore this around town after getting out of the water as a regular shirt and it didn't look out of place. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fair Skin Requirement
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and find applying sunscreen every 45 minutes to be tedious. This rash guard is perfect: less sunscreen, long sleeve, durable, nice fit, the half turtle neck is amazing. I haven’t been burned since getting this and I’m swimming everyday for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: A little big but sun protection is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband he sunburns super easy and we tried this on he did not get any sunburn and after swimming in a lake the shirt dried fast and is a little big and does not a tight fit but he felt comfortable with it. When wet it sticks to his body loose enough that gives him room to move.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy_Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: The material is on the thin side compared to other rash guards but in my opinion makes it more attractive because it is not so hot as thicker materials type. Slick looking and very well made. Great for swimming and other outdoor water activities
customer_reviews.author: tiburon

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfy UV RashGuard.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in full sun. It’s 85 degrees out now and I’m sitting comfortably in the sun with a hat on. This also works great in the water (pool) so far. I’m testing it out before my trip to the beach. More to come after the fact. I did buy a large even though my purchase history reflects medium.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Shirt was blemished.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt had a blemish on the front, which was noticed before the original clear package was opened. This shirt is probably a very nice product but should never have been shipped out. I cannot comment on the fit or quality because I had to return it for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and offers great protection
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a trip to the Caribbean and it did the trick. Although it was 80+ degrees out and sunny, this did not feel overly hot. It did a great job of keeping the sun off--was in the sun for almost 3 hours and not a speck of sunburn. That included about an hour of snorkeling. No rubbing at all. Will get another!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: 6’2” 175lbs = Large
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and now I don’t have to put sunscreen all over my body. Used it all summer with no issues. Dries fast out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have pasty white skin and burn easily. I have worn this multiple times kayaking and boating. Worked great. Fit well. Kept me from burning in the sun while being out for hours on the water multiple times. I'm 6'1" with broad shoulders. I bought a x large. I liked it so much I ordered one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Burke Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric with the right thickness for sun protection and quick drying. It is snug fighting and went a size up for a looser fit for swimming and sun protection. It is sized according to American sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Huh?

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: It's in between fitted and loose but it's great compared to the other tight one I have but it's great, the neck protection had me shocked when I tried it, didn't realize it has that.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Best Rash Guard Ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable, lightweight, fits well, and most importantly protective. I’m 6’ 1” and the XL fits perfect - not too tight, not too loose. It’s also a fraction of the cost of the trendy brands.
customer_reviews.author: J. Noor

customer_reviews.title: Good rash guard and sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and snug, slick material does not adhere to outer exposure suit and it provides good sun protection. Does make air temp feel cooler than actual temp and the tight fit makes it a little more difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and helped me stay safe under the sun while Body boarding and kayaking in the river for long hours. The fit is about a half size to large but very comfy and highly recommend this for anyone looking for a rashguard.
customer_reviews.author: YGomez

customer_reviews.title: Not high fashion but exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rashguard for protection against both jellyfish and the powerful sunshine. Easy to put on & take off, reasonably comfortable to wear & I didn't get sunburned. Much more affordable than brand name versions!
customer_reviews.author: Scubanut

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shirt
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Bought one size up. Fits well. Fabric is great. Like the design. being using this shirt for outdoor swimming. the color still holing after almost a month and provides protection from the sun. during swimining, it holds well around the body and doesn't float much. would recommend it for outdoor water activities.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a well made SPF long sleeve shirt with some neck protection and found this one. I am 5’11”, 200 pounds and this shirt fits me just right. Not too tight and not too long. I am very happy with this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne T.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit Sunscreen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic well made swim shirt. My son wore it several times for several hours at the beach. Gave him great protection and great fit for water fun.
customer_reviews.author: Proudmomof4

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, I am 15 pounds overweight all in my belly and this shirt had enough room to be comfortable and the rest of the shirt fit well
customer_reviews.author: DaveC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and provides great sun coverage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new longsleeve rashguard and this was half the price of other brands and this is my favorite. Really nice stitching, I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: bmola

customer_reviews.title: Working as intended
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it fits well ordered xl I’m 6”5 240lbs
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if sunshine was too strong besides the sea. Sun protection of this cloth is not obvious. And its sleeves are a little bit long but body is fit. It feels not very comfortable when you on the beach but it’s okay in the sea.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Prevents heat rashes
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a sun protector as I'm working outdoors in NYC and have extreme heat rashes during this time of year . Fits great , light and no rashes
customer_reviews.author: victoria bautista

customer_reviews.title: Order up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium was way too small, ordered a large it fit like a medium. Moral is order up. Fits good and good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, soft, and a great swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our vacay to the beach and it protected my sons torso while on the beach for hours. Very good item and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and good price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided on a large although I normally wear a medium t-shirt. It’s snug in the chest/shoulders but loose in the waist, which is what I wanted. I have not been disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits extremely tight
customer_reviews.text: Fits extremely tight. Unless you're very lean or muscular and like every muscle or piece of fat showing, this is not the shirt for you.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Day

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and nice that the collar is a bit higher. I use as a rash guard, in the pool. Fits as expected. Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tk9

customer_reviews.title: See ya later, sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly, was flattering, and obviates the need to put on sunscreen 12 times per day. I bought this one and a bright yellow one and love them both. Comfortable, quick drying, odor-free. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Radvansky

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover, just what I asked for but to small or to tight it is styled for a younger guy not someone over 75
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect temperature regulating shirt
customer_reviews.text: perfect temperature regulating shirt. I work outside so these shirts (I own 7) keep you warm when its slightly to cold outside. And they keep the heat off of you when it's really hot outside. The longer neck provides even more protection from the sun. And, they feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kilby

customer_reviews.title: Works and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Worn at the equator and not a sunburn for 2 weeks. Definitely blocks UV. Fits nice and tight, great for the water. It's also smooth and soft, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old for boating this summer. He loved this! It was snug and thick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband Love his shirt
customer_reviews.text: No Complaint! style was sexy and my husband love its. fits 5"8" 220lbs nicely if interested.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Sized right. Not a weird fit at all. Stitching seems decent.nice n long.
customer_reviews.author: tactical sam

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit but not skin-tight. Wicks pretty fast so I don't feel soaked for hours after. Looks good enough to wear for activity before and after swimming. Love the long sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: kate fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Then shirts ran small and is tight in the arms for me.... It is a decent shirt and does keep sun off you but it just doesn’t feel comfortable as other UV shirts.
customer_reviews.author: PSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit.. just as advertised.. awesome print.. just as I expected. Fits like a glove...
customer_reviews.author: Cheffdave

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for sun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shirt that is comfortable, protects from sun, and is still cool.
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: 5’10 360lbs.  Great buy at 3xl for comfort better compression at 2xl
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’10 360lbs. Got the 3xl and it’s comfortable feels great and helps me sweat but stay cool. I’d like a little more compression so I’m going to get a 2xl next to compare I plan in losing a bunch more weight so I’ll eventually be able to use it if it doesn’t fit. Love this tho the quality is great and it’s extremely comfortable no iching at all.
customer_reviews.author: Travis F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Really comfortable, does the job as intended. Plus I love the color. Quick drying. You don’t feel waterlogged getting out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be buying more of these. They fit great, feel great, have flat seems that will not cause irritation. Always buy a size bigger in these types of shirts to be a slightly more lose fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Governator

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect for my body and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered Large and the product fits perfectly on my body and it is comfortable to wear. I love wearing them. Will order again for other color.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and quality, ordered men S size for a skinny 5'5" boy. Fits loose, just as we wanted, in a perfect arm length.
customer_reviews.author: Books2read

customer_reviews.title: order larger
customer_reviews.text: Buy a size larger. Runs small. Sewing Quality is great and fabric color is vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Holly Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This swim shirt is of great quality. However, it runs small and is tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: Great shirts
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shirts. I ended up buying 5 in different colors. They all fit as expected and look and feel good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caponte04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace swim shirts that had stretched over time and were too big to swim in. This shirt was a perfect fit - true to size, and such a bargain. I would definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Came a little bigger than expected Does guard you from sun
customer_reviews.author: DS RN

customer_reviews.title: This fit me so perfect
customer_reviews.text: The price is awesome and the fit is spot one. Im so glad i purchased this shirt to protect myself from the UV emitting star called the sun.
customer_reviews.author: NeutronElf

customer_reviews.title: Really liked the item
customer_reviews.text: I finally ordered 2 sizes below (Size :S) compared to what the chart says as per measurements And S size was a decent tight fit. I expect the thermals to be body fit so that they bring in as little fluff as possible for the clothes to be worn on top of them. One may go for one size less than the measurement chart shown by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Swapan

customer_reviews.title: Good function, ok material
customer_reviews.text: The shirt works and is kinda tight on the skin. It works well but feels a little itchy inside.
customer_reviews.author: ting lim chan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great Rashguard shirt. I'm 6'1" , 175 lb. M size fits perfect. It’s even little loos for rashguard. Don't get larger size as someone suggested. This is rashguard, suppose be tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Great material. True to size and looks and feels real good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Castellar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Great style and fit for working out or swimming for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Best Rashguard shirt!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Rashguard shirt... I just went one size up and it was perfect( my husband doesn’t like tight clothes) I have already gotten 2 for my husband and 2 for other family members that fell in love with it from seeing my husband where his. We Live in Florida and use it year round.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Martincevic

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this on a kayaking trip, kept me sunburn free all day! Breathable too! Was never hot because of this
customer_reviews.author: RobtheTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rashguard. Only problem Is yah get way too hot wearing it on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Saud

customer_reviews.title: Great Rashguard
customer_reviews.text: My family has three of these and will be purchasing two more!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Goodman

customer_reviews.title: extra long torso
customer_reviews.text: not bad, its not a fitted style, more of a classic fit
customer_reviews.author: AC12345

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my whiteness from turning red... I burn too easily so this helps from having to lather up with sunblock all the time ( I always forget to after a few hours -_-
customer_reviews.author: Snowmann13

customer_reviews.title: great if you dont want to keep applying sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend loves it, but says next time he won't go with white as it stains too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rinaro

customer_reviews.title: nice tight fit for swimming
customer_reviews.text: I have a medical condition that makes me have to wear a swim shirt and this one fits the bill perfectly works great in the ocean keeps the area dry.
customer_reviews.author: rafael figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but that's expected with these kinds of shirts. This shirt has kept me from getting burned every time I'm out in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pagtalunan

customer_reviews.title: Step up from the regular crew necklong sleeve rash guard shirts
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband ( Im on his account) and I love it! Looks great on him more polished.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 4812

customer_reviews.title: I love them....I bought 3 of them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice! Lightweight and no need to worry about getting sunburned!
customer_reviews.author: Mount Dora Tech

customer_reviews.title: It fits snug.
customer_reviews.text: For the pool, you want a snug fit so when swimming, there won't be too much drag.
customer_reviews.author: Remy 007

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Xl fits great juat a little long in the waist
customer_reviews.author: Stormtrooperhityou

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Not too snug or too loose. Good material quality. Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good valuve
customer_reviews.text: I am little over 5'6" and 145 lb. ordered large fits me well. Can not rate the Sun protection yet.
customer_reviews.author: samg

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and great quality, bought another and will probably by more. Great price. Don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Develops mystery stains that refuse every treatment known to man after 2 wearings. Threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: AJWSF

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller
customer_reviews.text: I wear a large typically. Initially tried medium but still loose here and there. With a small, it fits perfectly tightly and no bothering during swimming.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am rather tall and slender, however, this product fits well. It kept me from getting burned under the sun and is comfortable. Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: it does get warm and it is a snug fit. but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: RPWARD89

customer_reviews.title: Would get it again
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. The size was right for the same size shirt that I normally get
customer_reviews.author: Jonboy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, fits well, doesn't restrict movement, drys fast, keeps the sun off, easy on and off even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Swamp gas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great sun protection & comfort. Sizing was spot on. No musty odor.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you want to look like Mr. Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This product's size is definitely not accurate, purchased 3XL. I looked like Mr Incredible. It does fit my son which wears medium size.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves and overall fit is a little too big. Buy a size down. Other than that, it seems to feel good and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, good in the water
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'3" 290lbs and the 3xl fit well. the length is a little long, but I like that -- no plumbers crack. I went for a swim and it really felt like I wasn't wearing it. Very happy with the apparent quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good shirt if you are going to the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: M O

customer_reviews.title: Shirt only fits  guys built like sleestacks.
customer_reviews.text: The arms on this shirt are built for a guy who drags his knuckles. It fits no person with a normal body type. I'm so annoyed with the shirt I can't even be bothered returning it and passing it on to another sucker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for those with longer arms and torso
customer_reviews.text: The quality is reasonable for the price. I bought the large and I’m 5’8” and 172 lbs. The sleeves and torso are too long for surfing. Other than that, it fits like a rash guard should.
customer_reviews.author: Sian Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Great protection. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. Fits well and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Taterpeace

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality I order for my hubby he love it
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

product_meta.title: TSLA Men's UPF 50+ Long Sleeve Rash Guard, UV/SPF Quick Dry Swim Shirt, Water Surf Swimming Shirts
feature_bullets: TSLA's original Rashguard lineup designed specifically for water sports and Surfing
